text: Bharuch assembly constituency (ભરૂચ વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Bharuch district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Bharuch Taluka (Part) Villages – Kanthariya, Sherpura, Umraj, Chavaj, Vadadla, Haldarwa, Jhadeshwar, Bholav, Nandelav, Rahadpor, Borbhatha Bet, Bharuch (INA), Bharuch (M), Maktampur (CT) # Ankleshwar Taluka (Part) Villages – Chhapra, Kansiya, Mandvabuzarg, Naugama, Samor, Motali, Amrutpura, Uchhali, Kararvel, Dadhal, Sarangpore, Jitali, Piprod, Avadar, Pardi Mokha, Sangpor, Andada (CT) ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 230 || 120465 || 112559 || 4 || 233028 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Mohit joshi, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Mohit joshi, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Dushyantbhai Patel, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== * List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Bharuch
title: Bharuch (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
